title: What should I do?
body: I was using the new client for ranked champion select, and suddenly the client crashed, so I lost 3 LP, now I only have 1 LP left, please help.{{champion:54}}

replies.body: Did you received a specific error message when the crash occurred or did the client simply close?
The client sent no message to me

Gotcha. So typically these crashes indicate that there are issues maintaining a solid connection to our matchmaking servers. For this reason, I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are configured properly for League.

Please let me know if those steps resolved this issue.
Yes，it had solved this issue，thank you very much！
